subfolders.description: IS 456 RC Beam Design Library (Python package). > ⚠️ **Development Preview:** APIs may change until v1.0. For reproducible results, pin to a release tag.

subfolders.name: agents
subfolders.description: Use these snippets to quickly engage the right agent with the right context. The role docs in this folder can guide **GitHub Copilot Coding Agent** when you create well-scoped GitHub Issues.

subfolders.name: docs
subfolders.description: If this folder feels “too big”, you’re right — most people only need a handful of docs. This page tells you which ones matter for which audience. > **Version info:** See [TASKS.md](TASKS.md) for curre

subfolders.name: logs
subfolders.description: This folder is for **local, machine-specific runtime logs** (debug output, ad-hoc run logs, temporary traces). - Logs are **not** part of the library’s source of truth and should not be committed.
